title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.11 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.11 - Public notice

State Regulations
OPWDD and each facility of OPWDD shall publicize, by posting
in a conspicuous location: (a) the
locations where records shall be made available for inspection or copying at
that facility; (b) the name, title, business address and business telephone of the designated records access
officer at that facility; and
(c) the right to appeal by any person denied access to a record, and the name and
business address of the records access appeals officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
603.11

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
